item.title: Custom MongoDB Replica Set Write Concern
item.description: One of the great things about MongoDB is write concern: Write concern describes the level of acknowledgement requested from MongoDB for write operations to a standalone mongod or to replica sets or to sharded clusters. Awesome! I want 1 write ack from any secondary in the primary DC so when the primary crashes we’re guaranteed to have an up-to-date secondary in the primary DC ready to be elected primary.
